channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 18:13 Driven anxiety in the Chernihiv region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 🟢 18:13 Driven anxiety in the Chernihiv region.Creck on further messages.#Chernihiv_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
